typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as string,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as short,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as short,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DataLake
source(output(
		CID as integer,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
Select1 split(UnitPrice>1 && UnitPrice<4,
	UnitPrice>3 && UnitPrice<4,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(stream1, stream2, Deafault)
DataLake, source1 lookup(CustomerID == CID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country,
		CID,
		Customer_Name = Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Lookup1 filter(Quantity>4) ~> Filter1
ConditionalSplit1@stream1 sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string,
		Description as string,
		Cutomer_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country,
		Description,
		Cutomer_Name = Customer_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@stream2 sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string,
		Description as string,
		Cutomer_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country,
		Description,
		Cutomer_Name = Customer_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Deafault sink(input(
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as double,
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string,
		Description as string,
		Cutomer_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country,
		Description,
		Cutomer_Name = Customer_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink3

source(output(
		InvoiceNo as string,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as string,
		InvoiceDate as string,
		UnitPrice as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		CID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(CustomerID == CID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country,
		CustomerName = Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Dept_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Customer1
source(output(
		Dept_ID as integer,
		Dept_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Department
Customer1, Department join(Customer1@Dept_ID == Department@Dept_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 split(Dept_Name=='HR',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(HR, Finance)
ConditionalSplit1@HR select(mapColumn(
		Cust_ID,
		Customer_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HRSelect
ConditionalSplit1@Finance select(mapColumn(
		Cust_ID,
		Customer_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinanceSelect
HRSelect sink(input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> HRSink
FinanceSelect sink(input(
		Cust_ID as integer,
		Customer_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> FinanceSink

source(output(
		Entry_ID as string,
		{State Patient Number} as string,
		{Date Announced} as string,
		{Age Bracket} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Detected City} as string,
		{Detected District} as string,
		{Detected State} as string,
		{State code} as string,
		{Num Cases} as string,
		{Current Status} as string,
		{Contracted from which Patient (Suspected)} as string,
		Notes as string,
		Source_1 as string,
		Source_2 as string,
		Source_3 as string,
		Nationality as string,
		{Type of transmission} as string,
		{Status Change Date} as string,
		{Patient Number} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Date_Anounced = coalesce(toDate({Date Announced},'MM/dd/yyyy'),toDate({Date Announced},'yyyy/MM/dd'),toDate({Date Announced},'dd/MM/yyyy'),toDate({Date Announced},'MMddyyyy'),toDate({Date Announced},'yyyyddMM'),toDate({Date Announced},'MMddyyyy'),toDate({Date Announced},'yyyyMMdd')),
		Detected_State_der = iif(isNull({Detected State}), 'NA', {Detected State}),
		Detected_District_der = iif(isNull({Detected District}), 'NA', {Detected District})) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Entry_ID,
		{State Patient Number},
		{Age Bracket},
		Gender,
		{Detected City},
		{State code},
		{Num Cases},
		{Current Status},
		{Contracted from which Patient (Suspected)},
		Notes,
		Nationality,
		Date_Anounced,
		Detected_State_der,
		Detected_District_der
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
source1 filter({Date Announced}!='NULL') ~> Filter1
Select2 sink(input(
		Entry_ID as integer,
		State_Patient_Number as string,
		Date_Announced as date,
		Age_Bracket as integer,
		Gender as string,
		Detected_City as string,
		Detected_District as string,
		Detected_State as string,
		State_code as string,
		Num_Cases as integer,
		Current_Status as string,
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Entry_ID,
		State_Patient_Number = {State Patient Number},
		Date_Announced = Date_Anounced,
		Age_Bracket = {Age Bracket},
		Gender,
		Detected_City = {Detected City},
		Detected_District = Detected_District_der,
		Detected_State = Detected_State_der,
		State_code = {State code},
		Num_Cases = {Num Cases},
		Current_Status = {Current Status},
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected = {Contracted from which Patient (Suspected)},
		Notes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Entry_ID as integer,
		State_Patient_Number as string,
		Date_Announced as date,
		Age_Bracket as integer,
		Gender as string,
		Detected_City as string,
		Detected_District as string,
		Detected_State as string,
		State_code as string,
		Num_Cases as integer,
		Current_Status as string,
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		Entry_ID as integer,
		State_Patient_Number as string,
		Date_Announced as date,
		Age_Bracket as integer,
		Gender as string,
		Detected_City as string,
		Detected_District as string,
		Detected_State as string,
		State_code as string,
		Num_Cases as integer,
		Current_Status as string,
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 aggregate(groupBy(Detected_State,
		Date_Announced),
	{Total Cases for State} = sum(Num_Cases)) ~> Aggregate1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(Detected_State,
		Detected_District,
		Date_Announced),
	{Total District Casess for Date and State} = sum(Num_Cases)) ~> Aggregate2
source2, Aggregate1 join(source2@Detected_State == Aggregate1@Detected_State
	&& source2@Date_Announced == Aggregate1@Date_Announced,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Entry_ID,
		State_Patient_Number,
		Date_Announced = source2@Date_Announced,
		Age_Bracket,
		Gender,
		Detected_City,
		Detected_District,
		Detected_State = source2@Detected_State,
		State_code,
		Num_Cases,
		Current_Status,
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected,
		Notes,
		{Total Cases for State}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, Aggregate2 join(Select1@Detected_State == Aggregate2@Detected_State
	&& Select1@Detected_District == Aggregate2@Detected_District
	&& Select1@Date_Announced == Aggregate2@Date_Announced,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		Entry_ID,
		State_Patient_Number,
		Date_Announced = Select1@Date_Announced,
		Age_Bracket,
		Gender,
		Detected_City,
		Detected_District = Select1@Detected_District,
		Detected_State = Select1@Detected_State,
		State_code,
		Num_Cases,
		Current_Status,
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected,
		Notes,
		{Total Cases for State},
		{Total District Casess for Date and State}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive({Percent District Per Day Cases} = divide({Total District Casess for Date and State},{Total Cases for State})*100) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Entry_ID,
		State_Patient_Number,
		Date_Announced,
		Age_Bracket,
		Gender,
		Detected_City,
		Detected_District,
		Detected_State,
		State_code,
		Num_Cases,
		Current_Status,
		Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected,
		Notes,
		Percent_District_Per_Day_Cases = {Percent District Per Day Cases}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 sink(input(
		Entry_ID as integer,
		State_Patient_Number as string,
		Date_Announced as date,
		Age_Bracket as integer,
		Gender as string,
		Detected_City as string,
		Detected_District as string,
		Detected_State as string,
		State_code as string,
		Num_Cases as integer,
		Percent_District_Per_Day_Cases as decimal(10,2),
		Current_Status as string,
		Contracted_from_which_Patient_Suspected as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Entry_ID,
		State_Patient_Number,
		Date_Announced,
		Age_Bracket,
		Gender,
		Detected_City,
		Detected_District,
		Detected_State,
		State_code,
		Num_Cases,
		Percent_District_Per_Day_Cases,
		Current_Status,
		Contracted_from_which_Patient_Suspected = Contracted_from_Patient_Suspected,
		Notes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		Date as string,
		Date_YMD as string,
		Status as string,
		TT as string,
		AN as string,
		AP as string,
		AR as string,
		AS as string,
		BR as string,
		CH as string,
		CT as string,
		DN as string,
		DD as string,
		DL as string,
		GA as string,
		GJ as string,
		HR as string,
		HP as string,
		JK as string,
		JH as string,
		KA as string,
		KL as string,
		LA as string,
		LD as string,
		MP as string,
		MH as string,
		MN as string,
		ML as string,
		MZ as string,
		NL as string,
		OR as string,
		PY as string,
		PB as string,
		RJ as string,
		SK as string,
		TN as string,
		TG as string,
		TR as string,
		UP as string,
		UT as string,
		WB as string,
		UN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 unpivot(output(
		State as string,
		Cases as string
	),
	ungroupBy(Date,
		Date_YMD,
		Status),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 derive(Dates = toDate(Date,'yyyy-mm-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Dates as date,
		Date_YMD as date,
		Status as string,
		State as string,
		Cases as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Dates = Date,
		Date_YMD,
		Status,
		State,
		Cases
	),
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 exists(source1@SalesRep_Number == source2@SalesRep_Number,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1, source2 exists(source1@SalesRep_Number == source2@SalesRep_Number,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['SalesRep_Number'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SalesRep_Number,
		SalesRep_Name,
		SalesRep_Department
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Exists2 sink(input(
		SalesRep_Key as integer,
		SalesRep_Number as integer,
		SalesRep_Name as string,
		SalesRep_Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
